verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, which <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%> did <S%H2372>see<s%>.

Set ye <S%H5375>up<s%> an <S%H5251>ensign<s%> upon the <S%H8192>bare<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, lift <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> unto <S%H5130>them<s%>, wave the <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that they may <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H6607>gates<s%> of the <S%H5081>nobles<s%>.

I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> my consecrated <S%H6942>ones<s%>, <S%H7121>yea<s%>, I have called my mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> for mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, even my <S%H1346>proudly<s%> exulting <S%H5947>ones<s%>.

The <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, <S%H1823>as<s%> of a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>! the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H6963>tumult<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%>! <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is <S%H6485>mustering<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

They <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, from the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> part of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, even <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of his <S%H2195>indignation<s%>, to <S%H2254>destroy<s%> the whole <S%H776>land<s%>.
Wail <S%H3213><s%> <S%H3117>ye<s%>; for the day of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand<s%>; as <S%H7701>destruction<s%> from the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> shall it <S%H935>come<s%>.
Therefore shall all <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H7503>feeble<s%>, and every <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H582>man<s%> shall <S%H4549>melt<s%>:

and they shall be <S%H926>dismayed<s%>; <S%H6735>pangs<s%> and <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> shall take <S%H270>hold<s%> of <S%H2342>them<s%>; they shall be in pain as a woman in <S%H2342>travail<s%>: they shall look in <S%H8539>amazement<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> at <S%H7453>another<s%>; their <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall be faces of <S%H6440>flame<s%>.

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the day of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>, <S%H394>cruel<s%>, with <S%H5678>wrath<s%> and <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>; to <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation<s%>, and to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the sinners thereof out of <S%H2400>it<s%>.

For the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H3685>constellations<s%> thereof shall not <S%H1984>give<s%> their <S%H216>light<s%>; the <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall be <S%H2821>darkened<s%> in its going <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> shall not cause its <S%H216>light<s%> to <S%H5050>shine<s%>.

And I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> for their <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: and I will cause the <S%H1347>arrogancy<s%> of the <S%H2086>proud<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>, and will lay <S%H8213>low<s%> the <S%H1346>haughtiness<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%>.
I will make a <S%H582>man<s%> more <S%H3365>rare<s%> than fine <S%H6337>gold<s%>, even a <S%H120>man<s%> than the pure <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir<s%>.

Therefore I will make the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> to <S%H7264>tremble<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H7493>shaken<s%> out of its <S%H4725>place<s%>, in the <S%H5678>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H5080>pass<s%>, that as the chased <S%H6643>roe<s%>, and as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6908>gathereth<s%>, they shall <S%H6437>turn<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his own <S%H5971>people<s%>, and shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> every man to his own <S%H776>land<s%>.
Every one that is <S%H4672>found<s%> shall be thrust <S%H1856>through<s%>; and every one that is <S%H5595>taken<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

Their <S%H5768>infants<s%> also shall be dashed in <S%H7376>pieces<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; their <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall be <S%H8155>rifled<s%>, and their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H7901>ravished<s%>.

Behold <S%H5782><s%>, I will stir up the <S%H4074>Medes<s%> against <S%H2803>them<s%>, who shall not regard <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and as for <S%H2091>gold<s%>, they shall not delight in <S%H2654>it<s%>.

And their <S%H7198>bows<s%> shall <S%H7376>dash<s%> the young <S%H5288>men<s%> in <S%H7376>pieces<s%>; and they shall have no <S%H7355>pity<s%> on the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb<s%>; their <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>.

And <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>, the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>' <S%H1347>pride<s%>, shall be as when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4114>overthrew<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>.

It shall <S%H5331>never<s%> be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>, neither shall it be <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%>: neither shall the <S%H6163>Arabian<s%> pitch <S%H167>tent<s%> <S%H7462>there<s%>; neither shall shepherds make their flocks to lie down <S%H7257>there<s%>.

But wild beasts of the <S%H6728>desert<s%> shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H1004>there<s%>; and their houses shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of doleful <S%H255>creatures<s%>; and <S%H1323>ostriches<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8163>there<s%>, and wild goats shall dance <S%H7540>there<s%>.

And <S%H338>wolves<s%> shall <S%H6030>cry<s%> in their <S%H490>castles<s%>, and <S%H8577>jackals<s%> in the <S%H6027>pleasant<s%> <S%H1964>palaces<s%>: and her <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%>, and her <S%H3117>days<s%> shall not be <S%H4900>prolonged<s%>.
